title: Support main clocking out
body: New changes have made the support role so dull. Rushing a sightstone gave your team a clear (pun intended) advantage and was a reward for going ham early. Considering it has always been a struggle to fill the support role I cannot imagine why on earth you would make these changes. If these changes persist I cannot see myself continuing to main support.

replies.body: Removing the support playmaking items is dumb. Now all supports are the same, ward bots. If Riot need a meta to follow, try season 4. We didn't have broken support items then. Learn from the past.

Pretty sure they did it to put an end to things like talisman nasus and frost queen's ekko. If players are gonna abuse support items then supports pay for it. Imo if they made it so that you can build into the new support items from sightstone and the starter support item this wouldn't be an issue. {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
